text: David Richmond Gergen (born May 9, 1942) is an American political commentator. He was a presidential adviser during the administrations of Richard Nixon, Gerald Ford, Ronald Reagan, and Bill Clinton. He is a senior political analyst for CNN.Michael Kelly. http://cnn.com Gergen is a professor of public service and he was the first director of the Center for Public Leadership at the Harvard Kennedy School. ==References== Category:1942 births Category:Living people Category:American political commentators Category:Educators from North Carolina Category:CNN people Category:White House Communications Directors Category:Politicians from North Carolina Category:Writers from North Carolina Category:Politicians from Massachusetts Category:Writers from Massachusetts Category:Businesspeople from Massachusetts Category:Businesspeople from North Carolina Category:Independent politicians in the United States Category:People from Durham, North Carolina Category:Harvard University faculty
title: David Gergen
